settings.title:
Functional food,
fur real.
settings.subtitle: Targeted, functional nutrition that aims to improve your pet’s life for good.

settings.newsletter_text:
Sign up to stay in the know, and receive
10% OFF your next Chicago purchase!

settings.title: We're here to help.
settings.text: We are a mindful collective with a focus on healing and wellness, looking to help people return to their authentic self. With our products, you can soothe your soul – and your joints!

settings.title: Something for everyone.
settings.text: We believe that our products help people and that they can have a positive impact on your every day life.

settings.title: Our effective approach.
settings.text: Not all cannabinoid products are created the same. We meticulously source our ingredients and are committed to bringing you only the very best.

settings.title: Feel the difference
settings.subtitle: your body & mind will thank you later.

settings.title: What's the difference between THC and CBD?
settings.subtitle: THC and CBD are both natural compounds found in Cannabis however, THC is the psychoactive which gives you the feeling of being high, while CBD does not contain the same psychoactive effects.

settings.title: Does CBD help with health issues?
settings.subtitle:
Many people use both CBD and THC to help with various health conditions. These conditions include pain relief, seizures, inflammation, anxiety and depression. 

However, these products are not intended to diagnose, prevent, treat, or cure any disease.

settings.title: Can I use CBD in recipes?
settings.subtitle: Sure! It is very common to consume CBD by ingesting edibles or adding oils into your own recipes.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.subtitle: For orders in Canada, you should receive your items within 1 - 3 business days. For orders in the U.S, you should receive your items within 10 business days.

settings.title: How can I keep my products fresh?
settings.subtitle: To keep your products fresh and potent, store them in a dark, dry place and in an airtight container.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.subtitle: No, unfortunately due to the nature of our products, we do not offer refunds.

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.subtitle: Subheading

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.subtitle: Subheading
settings.contact_content:
Need guidance? We're here to help. 

We'll do our best to get back to you within 48 hours, Monday - Friday. 

Have you checked out our FAQ page?

settings.title: You may also be interested in
Benefits
settings.text:
Uplight & ease your mind. Our CBD infused teas reduce anxiety, stress and help your feel calm – without any psychoactive effects.

DOSAGE
Scoop 1/2 to 1 tsp and add it to 2 cups of hot water. 

INGREDIENTS

• 10mg natural hemp extract 🌿
• Blend of lavender, strawberry and peppermint

settings.heading: SOPHIE ON SUPPLEMENTS
settings.subheading: Sophie was having trouble with stool consistency and when she went, it was not pretty. Sophie was also itching and scratching, likely from seasonal allergies and dry skin and coat.

settings.title: Keep it simple.
settings.description: We’re focused on 3 things: taste, nutrition and limited ingredients. We make sure pets get that rich, protein-forward flavor they love. We partner with leading vet nutritionists who ensure our whole food formulas pack a punch when it comes to benefits. Lastly, we keep the ingredients to a minimum and source from the USA and Canada.

settings.title: LOVE THIS pumpkin  puree powder!
settings.text: Love it!!! I've been using canned pumpkin for a while now but I've been waiting for a high quality, organic pumpkin puree powder for a long time, and it's finally here! My dog loves the taste, and it has no added sugar. It's also made in USA and Canada (not China)! I've already recommended to several of my dog's puppy pals!

settings.title: BEST YAK CHEWS! I LOVE THIS BRAND
settings.text: I have two miniature schnauzers and they LOVE these things. Yes, they are messy as they produce crumbs but I can live with that. I only let them chew on them for a little while each day. When they get small, I just pop them in the microwave for a minute and make the yak cheesey poofs! I have had no issue with mold, broken, or defective chews from this company.

settings.title: Best Quality Yak Chews Your Pet Dogs Will Love
settings.text: I received a perfect bag of chews that my dogs absolutely love! This is a great product that keeps the pups interested for days. When all that's left is a little nub, microwave it for a minute or two and it puffs into a big treat that they devour in minutes. Perfect product! Thank you!

settings.title: WHO WE ARE
settings.description:
We’re passionate pet owners and food nerds who want to give our pets access to high quality food.

We noticed a lot of fillers in our pets’ food...and decided to do something about it. We only use 7 ingredients (or less) in our formulas because our pets deserve to eat clean.

settings.title: OUR PROMISE TO YOU
settings.description: When it comes to your pet’s wellness, we guarantee you’ll see results or your money back.

settings.title: Pumpkin Powder
settings.text:
Shelf-stable powdered pumpkin that’s simply mixed with water and ready to go.

  • Addresses acute diarrhea
  • Relieves constipation
  • Helps prevent scooting
  • Shelf-stable for up to 2 years

settings.title: Probiotic Powder
settings.text:
A powdered mix of probiotics and natural prebiotics that help promote good gut bacteria

  • Addresses acute and chronic diarrhea
  • Creates a thriving environment for healthy flora
  • Super tasty and protein-packed
  • Shelf-stable for up to 2 years

settings.title: HIP + JOINT Chews
settings.text:
• Works to improve mobility
  • Helps alleviate joint pain
  • Aids in long-term joint health
  • Gives an extra protein boost

settings.benefit-title: 100% ORGANIC AND MADE IN NORTH AMERICA

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.description:
We only put in what’s necessary. 

As a caring pet parent, that seems like an obvious approach. Less ingredients, more benefits. But for many manufacturers within the pet supplements industry, they’d prefer to load in preservatives, unpronounceable compounds and filler and use dozens of ingredients in a single chew, artificial flavorings and preservatives, gluten based flours, and a variety of other unrecognizable ingredients.

But Native Pets is different. Our products were developed by nutritionists looking for the most efficacious and super functional formulas through responsibly sourced organic and all-natural ingredients. The result? A pet supplement you can trust with your dog’s health and wellbeing. And we wouldn’t have it any other way.

settings.description: Pumpkin Powder contains 60% soluble and 40% insoluble fibers.

Also love that, once it gets small and more risky for him to have, you can put it into the microwave. It puffs up and, when he chews it, the bone breaks apart like a potato chip.

settings.title: Works wonders!
settings.text: Our dog sometimes has loose stool. Using canned pumpkin can be expensive and messy. Plus not always available. This product is organic, less expensive and very easy to use. Always there when I need it. I love the quality, too. I will always have it on hand.
settings.author: Barbara

settings.text: My dogs dance for this broth! My girl loves it and I can sprinkle on her food or mix with water and make pawprint ice cubes with it for a cool treat to put in her kong. So easy, highly recommend!

Read what pets

settings.title:

settings.description:
Our formula was designed by a leading board-certified PHD and vet nutritionist who specializes in pet gut health. Her research led to just four targeted probiotics, plus artichoke and pumpkin to maintain the right fibrous home for good gut flora and protein-packed bone broth for taste.


TLDR:
It’s everything dogs need and nothing they don’t.

settings.title: DICESTIVE ISSUES SOLVED!
settings.text: This product is outstanding! My pup has had tummy troubles on and off for two years. After the first night, she was pooping solid! No tummy troubles since either! My dog Loves the taste and can't wait to eat each night. This has saved me so much time and money at the vet!
settings.author: Meaghan

settings.title: THE BEST PROBIOTIC MY DOC HAS EVER TRIED!
settings.text: My pup has the most sensitive stomach ever and gets regular bouts of diarrhea. Native Pet's Probiotic for dogs is hands down the best probiotic that we've tried! My dog's tummy is much more at ease and he just seems so much more happy and energetic. Plus, he absolutely Loves the flavor - he always runs to his bowl when it's time to eat.
settings.author: Jessica

settings.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY AND PET APPROVED!
settings.text: Thrilled to say that the four-legged roommates in the house LOVE this stuff (which is half the battle) and it's super cost effective on a per-animal basis in terms of how much I need to give them. Can't recommend this enough!
settings.author: Alex

settings.title: Can't live without it!
settings.text: We love the pumpkin powder! It's helped our dog Coconut tremendously, and we feel good about giving it to her because it is all natural, compared to other brands!
settings.author: Julie

settings.title: Helped my puppy!
settings.text: My vet recommended adding pumpkin to my puppy’s diet for his sensitive stomach. It has been great and has firmed up his stools. Highly recommended.
settings.author: Mary

settings.title: Perfect For..
settings.text:
• Travel. New environments can be, um, ruff.
  • Helping your pet pass something they ate.
  • Aiding with food sensitivity (or if pup’s being picky).
  • Any sudden strange changes in bowel movements.
  • Replacing heavy, expensive cans of puréed pumpkin.

settings.benefit-title: Helps achieve optimal levels of all Omega-3s

settings.title: 5 simple ingredients. 1 magical formula.
settings.description:
We start with two types of fish oil for a well-rounded boost of both EPA and DHA Omega-3’s. It’s the most effective, active ingredient for supporting healthy skin and coat.

The third type of Omegas can only be found in veggies. Enter: Wheat Germ Oil...which actually contains no wheat! Our vet nutritionist recommended it for its abundance in much-needed ALA Omega-6 fatty acids and Vitamin E. 

Good fatty acids need a good metabolizer. We added Biotin (aka Vitamin B7) to keep up with all that cell turnover, ensuring it all goes down smoothly. 

Not all preservatives are bad. We chose this particular tocopherol, not only to make our Omega Oil last longer, but also for its antioxidant benefits. This is what we call a win-win for skin health.

settings.title: A Game Changer!
settings.text: My dog has allergies and this product has really helped with her skin issues. Will buy it again!
settings.author: Johana

settings.title: Hachi likes it!
settings.text: I love to cook for my babe Hachi. I realize though that I’ve been missing essential omegas from oil that I haven’t been adding to his meals. When I saw Native Pet had this, I had to try it. Hachi likes it! I’m happy to be able to incorporate this into his life now. I recommend!
settings.author: C. Be

settings.title: He loves the taste
settings.text: My pup has always been a picky eater, but now he just can't get enough! I add one pump to his food every day--it couldn't be easier.
settings.author: Anna

settings.title: Perfect For..
settings.text:
• A daily dose of much-needed nutrients not found in kibble alone
  • Building a nutritious food regimen with other Native Pet formulas
  • Helping to reduce itching and scratching during allergy season
  • Promoting relief from mild-to-moderate joint pain
  • Helping to soothe any skin and coat issues

settings.title: Your headline
settings.text: Promotion description appears here.

settings.title:
4 Simple Ingredients.
1 Magic Formula.
settings.description: Cool story: Yak chews are a centuries-old hard cheese recipe, developed by Nepalese yak herdsmen who needed quick doses of protein at high elevations. We use the same simple recipe here. Starting with milk, we use salt and lime to create curds, which are then pressed, hardened, cut and smoked over a fire for 1-2 months. All Certified Organic ingredients are sourced directly from the Himalayan foothills.✌️

settings.title: Perfect For...
settings.text:
• Occupying dogs for hours with just 1 stick
  • Providing added protein not found in kibble alone
  • Giving your carpet a break from the typical chew mess

settings.title: Icon
settings.description: Text area

settings.title: He loves these things
settings.text: My 20-pound French bulldog loves these things. He'll work on it for about 45 minutes and makes a small dent in it. I’d say one...will last about a month. It's a pretty good value. The only downside is the leftover shavings that you will find on the floor, so give it to your dog on a blanket or outside.
settings.author: Verified Customer

settings.title: Great for My Dog Who Loves to Chew
settings.text: These are great for dogs that love to chew. They last about 1.5-2 weeks with our puppy that loves to chew. Also love that, once it gets small and more risky for him to have, you can put it into the microwave. It puffs up and, when he chews it, the bone breaks apart like a potato chip.
settings.author: TMB

settings.title: My dogs couldn’t like these more
settings.text: They chew them constantly. My Chihuahua and Cavalier make them last, while my Cockapoo n manage to polish one off in a couple days. Still, they give my babies something to do when bored and they tell me they’re delicious.
settings.author: Verified Customer

settings.title: Time saver!
settings.text: My dogs dance for this broth! My girl loves it and I can sprinkle on her food or mix with water and make pawprint ice cubes with it for a cool treat to put in her kong. So easy, highly recommend!
settings.author: Verified Buyer

settings.title: Great bone broth for dogs
settings.text: I did a lot of research before choosing this product for my two Greyhounds. It’s a healthy alternative to the liquid broths you can buy in your local supermarket because it doesn’t have all of the added ingredients.
settings.author: Tina

settings.title: I no longer have a picky eater - this works!!
settings.text: I have a senior dog that’s turned into a very picky eater and needed to get him to eat more and put some weight on. He loves the gravy and gobbles up his food. This is a great product - good for the diet with protein and fat for my little guy.
settings.author: CCM

settings.title: 6 Simple Ingredients. 1 Magic Formula.
settings.description:
Real chicken, organic coconut glycerin and natural tocopherols form the backbone of our air-dried chew, allowing for a protein-forward supplement with a longer shelf life and bonus Vitamin E benefits.

Green Lipped Mussel is an anti-inflammatory superhero. In the right dosage over a 6-week period, it’s been clinically shown to reduce arthritic scores, joint pain and joint swelling in dogs. But we don’t stop there...  

Poly-whatta? Don’t worry, polyphenols are beneficial micronutrients found naturally in fruits, veggies, and herbs. Our special blend targets joint inflammation.

We use bone broth that features type II collagen, which has been linked to reducing overall joint pain.

settings.title: Perfect For...
settings.text:
• Promoting relief from mild-to-moderate joint pain
  • Helping to increase mobility, especially for older dogs
  • A daily dose of much-needed nutrients not found in kibble alone
  • Building a nutritious food regimen with other Native Pet formulas

settings.text:
20+ ingredients

like Palm fruit oil.

settings.description: Formulated by a leading vet nutritionist, our chews feature clean ingredients in the exact doses your dog needs. Through our game-changing method of air-drying these ingredients, we found a way to deliver real food nutrients without sacrificing any of their naturally occurring benefits.

Soft chews tend to lean on fillers, flavorings and hard-to-pronounce ingredients that, although tasty, are unnecessary. Even Glucosamine and Chondroitin are questionable when many brands don’t use enough to render them effective.
With Native Pet’s Air-Dried Chews, you get the cleanest, most effective chew available...no, seriously, we’ve looked.

settings.section_title: Why air-dried beats those soft chews

settings.title: 1We use fewer ingredients and keep it clean.
settings.text: That seems like an obvious approach, right? Less ingredients, more benefits. But many other manufacturers prefer to use dozens of ingredients in a single product. We’re talking artificial flavorings and preservatives, gluten-based flours, and a variety of other unrecognizable ingredients. Thank you, next...

settings.title: 2We make sure each formula is highly effective.
settings.text: Our products were developed by nutritionists looking for the most effective and super functional formulas through responsibly sourced, organic, and all-natural ingredients.. Each ingredient is carefully targeted for its natural benefits and chosen for how it works in tandem with others. Speaking of working together...

settings.title: 3We keep it easy for you and tasty for them.
settings.text: Dried chews. Efficient oils. Mixable powders. See a theme? We’ve found new and better ways to deliver pure pet nutrition. Our easy-to-use formats naturally keep each formula’s power-packed goodness intact. We also make sure there’s a protein-forward flavor in every one. Native Pet dogs agree...we nailed it.

settings.title: Affiliate Program
settings.description: Partner with us to promote the healing power of high-quality foods and good nutrition for our furry friends.

settings.title: We’d love to have you and your pet join our mission!
settings.text: Native Pet is a pet nutrition and wellness company that makes all-natural, highly effective, and limited ingredient pet supplements for dogs.

settings.title: Who is it for?
settings.text: The program is a great fit for pet-loving bloggers, influencers, Youtube creators, or freelancers, and small businesses whose audience is looking for ways to naturally bolster the health and well-being of their pets.

settings.title: Affiliate Benefits
settings.text:
We are here to help and support you with anything you need to make our collaboration a success!

We will offer you:
- Free product of choice
- 10-20% commission based on order value
- 30-day cookie
- 15% discount for your audience
- Personal 20% off ‘forever’ discount code for your purchases
- Great marketing materials
- High-converting content for easy sales
- Help and support from the team

settings.title: 1 Apply to the program
settings.text: Sign up and upon getting accepted, gain access to our affiliate dashboard featuring your personal tracking link, sales, and advertising materials.

settings.title: 2 Tell your audience about Native Pet
settings.text: Create quality content for your audience and add your tracking link to it. You can use our advertising materials for inspiration or reach out to get custom ones. We’re happy to help

settings.title: 3 Get the industry's highest commission
settings.text: Every time your custom link drives sales for Native Pet, you get a revenue share. Native Pet offers the best commissions in the pet supplement market. Receive your payouts monthly via PayPal.

settings.shortdesc:
Join the program

To become an affiliate or influencer, please fill out the appropriate form, and we will get in touch within 2 working days.

If you have any questions or ideas about the partner program, please send us an email at partners@nativepet.com and we will get back to you in a few days!
settings.title: For Influencers
settings.text: If you are a social media influencer or pupfluencer, please sign up for our program here.
settings.formscript:
Publishers

If you are a blogger, Youtube creator or own a pup-related web publication then please sign up for our program here:

settings.title: What are the Terms and Conditions of the affiliate program?
settings.subtitle:
Please make sure you familiarize yourself with the privacy policy and terms and conditions of the Native Pet affiliate program before signing up. It's important to read the documents in full because both describe the principles of the program.

If you have any questions regarding terms and conditions, please reach out to
partners@nativepet.com.

settings.title: How long is the cookie tracking?
settings.subtitle: Our affiliate cookies last for a full 30 days, maximizing the chances that you'll be rewarded for the referral. If a user purchases the product after 30 days since the first referred visit, the conversion won’t be tracked anymore

settings.title: How and when will I get paid?
settings.subtitle:
You earn a commission when someone who has used your affiliate link becomes our active customer. You can earn a 10-20% commission depending on the value of the purchase.

The commission tears are as following:

- 10% on order value smaller than $34.99

- 15% on order value $35 - $49.99

- 20% on order value bigger than $50

Payouts are made at the beginning of each month for accounts that have a balance of at least $50.

settings.title: How should I promote Native Pet?
settings.subtitle:
Promote Native Pet in a way that is the most natural for your audience. We have also prepared some great advertising materials, so feel free to use them. You can find them on your affiliate dashboard.

Please note that there are also some restrictions and prohibited activities. Please see our Terms and Conditions for coupon and ad guidelines.

If you need anything specific regarding Native Pet’s branding visuals, just get in touch with us and we will be happy to help you!

settings.title: How do I get my unique affiliate link?
settings.subtitle: We will send you an email with your personal affiliate link and all the necessary information once you are accepted to the program. Additionally, you can find your personal affiliate link on your Partner Dashboard.

settings.title: I still have a few more questions! Who can I contact?
settings.subtitle: Please contact Native Pet’s partnerships team at partners@nativepet.com.

settings.title: 3 active ingredients. 1 magical formula.
settings.description:
First up, it’s our good friend, Cranberry! We use this targeted extract to make the urinary tract less hospitable for bacterial adherence, colonization, and infection. Thanks, Cranberry.

D. Mannose is used to move bacteria away from latching onto the urinary tract lining.Our researchers have found that cranberry-based sugar works particularly well against E-coli, which is often the culprit of frequent UTIs.

And then there’s B.Subtilis, a probiotic strain that’s used to help reduce the number of antibiotic-resistant microbes in the urinary tract, creating a better environment for fighting off UTIs.

Real chicken, chicken bone broth, organic coconut glycerin, and natural tocopherols form the backbone of our air-dried chew, offering a protein-forward supplement with a longer shelf life and bonus Vitamin E benefits.

Native pet
AIR-DRIED CHEW

2. D. Mannose

4. Chicken bone broth (for collagen)

5. Tocopherols

6. Coconut Glycerin

7. Real Chicken


(That’s it)

settings.description: Formulated by a leading vet nutritionist, our chews feature clean ingredients in the exact doses your dog needs. Through our game-changing method of air-drying these ingredients, we found a way to deliver real food nutrients without sacrificing any of their naturally occurring benefits.

Soft chews tend to lean on fillers, flavorings and hard-to-pronounce ingredients that, although tasty, can be counterproductive.


With ours, you get the cleanest, most effective chew available...no, seriously, we’ve looked.

settings.section_title: Why air-dried beats those soft chews

settings.title: LOVE THIS pumpkin  puree powder!
settings.text: Love it!!! I've been using canned pumpkin for a while now but I've been waiting for a high quality, organic pumpkin puree powder for a long time, and it's finally here! My dog loves the taste, and it has no added sugar. It's also made in USA and Canada (not China)! I've already recommended to several of my dog's puppy pals!

settings.title: BEST YAK CHEWS! I LOVE THIS BRAND
settings.text: I have two miniature schnauzers and they LOVE these things. Yes, they are messy as they produce crumbs but I can live with that. I only let them chew on them for a little while each day. When they get small, I just pop them in the microwave for a minute and make the yak cheesey poofs! I have had no issue with mold, broken, or defective chews from this company.

settings.title: Best Quality Yak Chews Your Pet Dogs Will Love
settings.text: I received a perfect bag of chews that my dogs absolutely love! This is a great product that keeps the pups interested for days. When all that's left is a little nub, microwave it for a minute or two and it puffs into a big treat that they devour in minutes. Perfect product! Thank you!

settings.title: 4 active ingredients. 1 magical formula.
settings.description:
Ah, Spirulina, the wonder algae. This superfood is loaded with anti-inflammatory benefits. One of them is to protect from reactions to allergens, making it perfect for our formula.

But we’re not done on the allergy front. Dried Fermentate, a unique fermented supplement, is a “post-biotic” that increases antibodies to fight environmental allergies year-round.

Colostrum, aka “first milk”, is packed with nutrients and antibodies. Known to support immune health and counter inflammatory bowel disorders, Colostrum can help ward off digestive issues (like leaky gut) and autoimmune diseases.

Lastly, B. Coagulans, a powerful probiotic, gives new life to cells in the immune system and helps boost their response to infections. And, as a probiotic, it also supports gut health.

Real chicken, chicken bone broth, organic coconut glycerin, dried whole krill and natural tocopherols form the backbone of our air-dried chew, offering a protein-forward supplement with a longer shelf life and bonus Vitamin E benefits.

9. Real Chicken


(That’s it.)

settings.description:
Dr. Hammond received her Doctor of Veterinary Medicine degree from Texas A&M University College of Veterinary Medicine and currently practices as a general practice and emergency veterinarian in Charleston, South Carolina.

As a primary care and emergency veterinarian, I often diagnose pancreatitis in dogs, and know how difficult and confusing it can be for pet parents to learn their dog is suffering from this disease, especially when they have no prior knowledge of pancreatitis. 

This article covers everything you need to know about pancreatitis in dogs so you can quickly recognize the symptoms of pancreatitis in your pet, reduce your pet’s risk of developing pancreatitis, and understand how pancreatitis is treated and managed if your pet receives a diagnosis of pancreatitis.
